channel.title: CVE Feed for Fieldcomm Group -- HART-IP Developer Kit
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Fieldcomm Group -- HART-IP Developer Kit

item.title: CVE-2020-16209|2024-08-04T13:37:53.853Z -- fieldcomm%20group -- hart-ip%20developer%20kit
item.description: A malicious attacker could exploit the interface of the Fieldcomm Group HART-IP (release 1.0.0.0) by constructing messages with sufficiently large payloads to overflow the internal buffer and crash the device, or obtain control of the device.
